name: Altium Designer PCB Project Structure
summary: Learn about .PRJPCBSTRUCTURE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: A PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file is a project data file created by Altium Designer, a CAD application used to design printed circuit boards (PCBs). When a Designer user creates a new project (.PRJPCB file), Designer creates an accompanying PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file. This file contains information about the project's hierarchy.

A project's PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file contains references to each of that project's schematic documents (.SCHDOC files). When a user opens a project document, Designer automatically updates (or if necessary, recreates) that project's PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file.
NOTE: When importing a Designer project into another CAD application, such as Cadence OrCAD, you often must possess both the project's PRJPCB and PRJPCBSTRUCTURE file.
PRJPCBSTRUCTURE files are not meant to be opened. For more information about PRJPCBSTRUCTURE files, refer to Altium's official documentation.
Sort Pricing Program Name Platform Reset X
